name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Sengoku Gunyuuden
overview: Nobunaga no Yabou: Sengoku Gunyuuden is the third title in the Nobunaga no Yabou series, released December 1988 for PC-88, then quickly ported for various Japanese computers like the FM TOWNS in 1989. Taking after the Romance of the Three Kingdoms series, this game introduces the concept of "generals" to this series. The Tōhoku and Kyūshū areas were removed.
